thread.title: BRIEF-FXCM Group Says Feb Customer Trading Volume up 19% from a year ago

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-FXCM Group Says Feb Customer Trading Volume up 19% from a year ago

organizations.name: brief-fxcm group says feb customer trading volume

text:
March 6 (Reuters) - FXCM Group
* FXCM GROUP REPORTS MONTHLY METRICS * FXCM GROUPâ€‹ SAYS FEB CUSTOMER TRADING VOLUME $239 BILLION, 19% HIGHER THAN LAST YEAR
* FXCM GROUP - AVERAGE CUSTOMER TRADING VOLUME PER DAY OF $12.0 BILLION IN FEBRUARY 2018, UP 20%
* FXCM GROUP - AVERAGE OF 415,479 CLIENT TRADES PER DAY IN FEBRUARY 2018, UP 2%
* FXCM GROUP - ACTIVE ACCOUNTS OF 112,354 AS OF FEBRUARY 28, DOWN 14% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: [FXCM Group]
